title: Writing and Drawing for Expression

vocab.definition: Making letters and words on paper
Making pictures with crayons, pencils, or markers
To show or tell about your thoughts and feelings
Sounding out words to spell them the best you can

teachingNotes: Encourage invented spelling and drawing to communicate. Provide various writing materials. Celebrate all attempts at communication.

sample.question: Draw a picture of your family and tell what you drew.
Write one sentence about your favorite animal.
Label the parts of your drawing.
Draw a weather picture and describe it.
Make a simple card for a friend.
Draw something that makes you happy.
Write a short caption for your drawing.

truefalse.question: Drawing pictures can tell a story.
expectedAny: pictures can communicate ideas and stories

truefalse.question: You have to spell every word perfectly when you write.
Writing and drawing both help you express ideas.
expectedAny: both are ways to communicate thoughts

truefalse.question: Only adults can write real words.
Pictures and words can work together.
expectedAny: illustrations and text complement each other

truefalse.question: You should never make mistakes when writing.
Drawing is only for fun, not for learning.
expectedAny: drawing helps with learning and expression

multiplechoice.question: What is a good way to share your ideas?
expectedAny: writing and drawing help share ideas

multiplechoice.question: What should you do first when you want to write?
If you don't know how to spell a word, what can you do?
choices: ask someone else to write it

multiplechoice.question: What makes writing special?
expectedAny: expressing thoughts is what matters most

wordProblems.question: Emma draws 3 pictures of her family and writes 2 stories about her pet. How many creative works did she make?
In art class, 8 children draw pictures and 5 children write stories. How many children are expressing ideas?
Jake uses 4 crayons for his drawing and 1 pencil for writing. How many tools did he use?
A book has 6 pages with pictures and 4 pages with just words. How many pages total?
Maria writes her name 7 times to practice. If each time uses 5 letters, how many letters did she write?
There are 12 students in class. If 9 students finish their drawings, how many still need to finish?
Sam makes 2 drawings on Monday and 3 drawings on Tuesday. How many drawings did he make in total?
